entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
